description: seeks proposals from bidders for Informatics Professional Services

full_summary:
### Flood Mapping Web Presence and Integration Requirements Gathering
#### Tender Notice

**Tender Reference Number:** PW-23-01024692
**Amendment Number:** 4
**Solicitation Number:** NRCan-5000068423

**Publication Date:** February 3, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** March 21, 2023 at 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
**Amendment Date:** March 13, 2023

**Contracting Entity:**
Natural Resources Canada
580 Booth Street
Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E4

**Notice Type:**
Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Method:**
Competitive - Open Bidding

**Synopsis:**
Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is seeking proposals from qualified bidders for Informatics Professional Services (IPS) to establish a flood mapping web presence and gather integration requirements. The project aims to create a comprehensive web-based platform for flood mapping and data integration.

**Eligibility Requirements:**
Bidders must demonstrate expertise in Informatics Professional Services, including web development, data integration, and GIS mapping technologies. They must also meet the requirements outlined in the RFP documents.

**Instructions to Bidders:**
to formally bid on this project, Bidders must email procurement-approvisionnement@NRCan-RNCan.gc.ca no less than five business days prior to the bid closing date, requesting to open a CPC Connect conversation to discuss the project further.

**Project Details:**
One (1) contract is expected to be awarded, with an expected contract term from the date of award until March 31, 2024, with an option to extend the contract term for an additional twelve (12) months.

**Contact Information:**
For more information, contact Marie-Josée Michaud at 418-563-6916, or marie-josée.michaud@canada.ca.

**Attachments:**
The tender package is available on the Canada Buy Service portal at the following links: [insert links].
